issue.title: [C++] TestAsyncUtil.ReadaheadFailed asserts occasionally in GatingTask
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13356](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13356). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Observed on arm64 Travis. <https://app.travis-ci.com/github/apache/arrow/jobs/524933940#L2294-L2299> 
```

[ RUN      ] TestAsyncUtil.ReadaheadFailed
/arrow/cpp/src/arrow/testing/gtest_util.cc:856: Failure
Failed
A GatingTask instance was destroyed but some underlying tasks did not start running
[  FAILED  ] TestAsyncUtil.ReadaheadFailed (7 ms)
```
